alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN... SOUTHWESTERN GLYNN...BRANTLEY...EAST CENTRAL WARE AND NORTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waynesville to 8 miles southeast of Hickox to Race Pond. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Woodbine, Nahunta, Homeland, Hickox, Waynesville, Race Pond, Fort Mudge, Waverly, and Braganza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
